articles.author: Lily Ford
articles.title: How the Collapse of Prince Harry’s Charity Sentebale Has Unfolded Amid “Bullying” Claims - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: After the Duke of Sussex resigned from his role at the HIV and AIDS charity working in Africa on Wednesday, its chairwoman has now accused Harry of "harassment and bullying.”
articles.content:
Prince Harry has been accused of bullying after resigning from a charity he co-founded nearly 20 years ago.
Sentebale was launched by the Duke of Sussex — in honor of his mother, Princess Diana — an… [+2701 chars]
